title: Pixel 2 XL Android 11 Captive Portal Connectivity Issue
content:
Every time I try to connect to a Captive Portal  to login to WiFi, I have getting a "This site can't be reached" page.

I'm getting this on Android 11 on the Pixel 2 XL.

I noticed if I turn off mobile data completely, I can login to the captive portal without any problems.

I'm guessing that Android is swapping between the WiFi network and Mobile data network. So when I try to get to the login screen for the captive portal, it ignores the WiFi network and tries to find the captive portal through the mobile data network.
